availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles T. Noel (Daviess County, KY, farmer and prov govt)

body.p: Daviess County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Sarah E. Noel. Father of Lydia T. Noel, David K. Noel, Charles Noel, Mary B. Noel, James Noel, and Sally Noel. Owned two enslaved persons in Daviess County in 1850. Farmer in Daviess County in 1850. Owned six enslaved persons in Daviess County in 1860. Farmer in Daviess County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.
